item.title: Yell command delay
item.dc:creator: @scottbenton scottbenton
item.description:
@scottbenton wrote:

Hello fellow moparscapians i was wondering how would i go about making the yell command have a delay i know it is simple but i have forgotten the Delay code i know it should go something like

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
{
Delay= 1;

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();
[/code]
Something like that
